Interface ICurve

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Curve, Polygon, RenderCurve

    Author:
    rodrigue

      void setListOfCurveSegments(ListOf<CurveSegment> listOfCurveSegments)
      The listOfCurveSegments element contains arbitrary number of curve segments that can be either of type LineSegment or of type CubicBezier.
      boolean unsetListOfCurveSegments()
      Removes the #listOfCurveSegments from this Model and notifies all registered instances of TreeNodeChangeListener.

      • setListOfCurveSegments

        void setListOfCurveSegments(ListOf<CurveSegment> listOfCurveSegments)
        The listOfCurveSegments element contains arbitrary number of curve segments that can be either of type LineSegment or of type CubicBezier. Here, both classes are child classes of the abstract type CurveSegment.
        Parameters:
        listOfCurveSegments -

      • unsetListOfCurveSegments

        boolean unsetListOfCurveSegments()
        Removes the #listOfCurveSegments from this Model and notifies all registered instances of TreeNodeChangeListener.
        Returns:
        true if calling this method lead to a change in this data structure.
